oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Traduction arabe des Pièces relatives à la procédure et au jugement de Soleyman El-Hhaleby, assassin du Général en Chef Kléber
مجمع التحريرات المتعلقة الى ما جرى باعلام ومحاكمة سليمان الحلبي قاتل صاري عسكر العام كلهبر
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Records of the trial of Sulayman al-Halabi, who had assassinated the general of the French campaign in Egypt, Kleber, on 14 June 1800. The text contains colloquial Arabic elements.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Kléber, Jean-Baptiste, 1753-1800. -- Assassination.; Ḥalabī, Sulaymān, d 1800. -- Trial.; Egypt -- History -- French occupation, 1798-1801 -- Sources.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library, American University in Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: This item is in the public domain.
